Surveys

Sandile Rikhotso

Aspiring MBA Scholar

Dear Colleagues,

I introduce myself as Sandile Sindile Buwazi Rikhotso, an aspiring scholar pursuing a Master of Business Administration at the esteemed University of Limpopo. I cordially extend an invitation for your valuable participation in a research endeavor titled: Exploring the Dynamics of Customer Satisfaction at the University of Limpopo through the Lens of the SERVQUAL Model.

The core objective of this study revolves around gauging the level of satisfaction among University of Limpopo's students with regard to the services they receive. Adopting the reputable SERVQUAL model, this research seeks to understand the intricate interplay between the students' expectations and the actual service quality delivered by the dedicated staff of the university's Centre Administration Offices. The insights garnered from this exploration will contribute to evaluating the alignment between students' perceptions and the actual service experience.

Your gracious participation in this survey would be immensely valuable. I extend the freedom to participate at your discretion – should you choose not to partake or opt not to respond to certain inquiries, your decision will be wholeheartedly respected. I assure you that all shared responses will remain strictly confidential and anonymous. The knowledge acquired from this study will be treated with the utmost confidentiality, and your individual responses will remain undisclosed to any other party. To access the survey questionnaire, I kindly request you to follow this link. view survey

Max Rin

PHD Candidate

Greetings, I am an honours in communication studies conducting a survey which requires adults to look back to their time as children and adolescent when they started using digital technologies and social media. The survey responses will be recorded anonymously to enable honesty in responses. It will greatly appreciated if you complete the survey. Your privacy is guaranteed. Your names or personal identifiers are not required for this survey. Thank you for participating in the survey. view survey

Sandile Rikhotso

MBA Candidate

Dear Fellow Students,

I am Sandile Sindile Buwazi Rikhotso, a candidate for a Master of Business Administration at the University of Limpopo. I kindly invite you to participate in the research project titled: Assessment of customer satisfaction at the University of Limpopo using SERVQUAL model.

The aim of the study is to assess customer satisfaction on the services provided to University of Limpopo students using the SERVQUAL model. In this study, the customer refers to registered students at University of Limpopo and are required to evaluate the service quality of administration services offered by the university’s Centre Administration Offices staff. This will help determine if the expectations of the students are met or not after the students have received such services.

I would appreciate it if you could take your time to complete the following questionnaire. Please note that participating in this study is voluntary, you may opt not to take part altogether or not to answer any questions you do not wish to answer. You are assured that the responses given will remain confidential and anonymous. The collected data from this study will be protected, and no one else will know your answers to the questions being asked. To complete the questionnaire, kindly follow this link: view survey.
